title: Honor Pad 5 4 GB RAM 64 GB ROM 8 inch with Wi-Fi+4G Tablet (Glacial Blue)

product_specification.Processor Type: Kirin 710 (64-bit) Octa Core (4 x Cortex A73 at 2.2 GHz + 4 x Cortex A53 at 1.7 GHz)
product_specification.Additional Features: Built-in Dual Stereo Speakers, Dolby Atmos Sound, GPU Turbo 2.0, Quick and Secure Face Unlock
product_specification.Sales Package: Tablet, Power Adapter, USB Cable, Eject Pin, User Manual, Warranty Card
product_specification.Other Camera Features: Autofocus Rear Camera and Fixed Focus Front Camera
product_specification.Other Connectivity Features: Bluetooth Support, 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz Dual Band Wireless Connectivity
product_specification.Other Display Features: Full HD Multi touch IPS Display
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year on Tablet, 6 Months on Battery

product_description.Full HD Screen and Dolby Atmos Surround: This tablet from Honor features a 20.3-cm (8) Full HD screen to deliver rich visuals. It is also equipped with dual stereo speakers and Dolby Atmos surround sound for an immersive cinematic experience.
product_description.Play it Loud, Play it True: Thanks to the built-in dual Smart PA, you can experience realistic acoustics, enhanced bass, and improved audio quality even when you are listening to music at a maximum volume.
product_description.Flagship Kirin 710 Chipset: This tablet is powered by a 12nm Kirin 710 chipset and an ARM Cortex-A73 processor. You can enjoy regular daily use or seamless gaming every day. It also ensures better usage and power efficiency.
product_description.GPU Turbo 2.0: Your Gaming Specialist: Bid goodbye to lag and pixelated graphics while playing games as this tablet is powered by the GPU Turbo technology. It enhances the image rendering ability so you can enjoy playing games with excellent graphics quality.
product_description.Dedicated Kid-friendly Content: You can now download and let your children access various kid-friendly, educational learning content from the Children's Corner. The educational content will ignite their minds and help them gain new knowledge while having fun at the same time.
product_description.Intelligent Protection for Kid\u2019s Ey: You can customize and control a kid’s screen usage time with this Honor Pad 5. Also, it comes with a Blue Ray Filter technology that filters out harmful blue light from the screen, thereby protecting their little eyes. Moreover, the posture guidance feature detects the real-time sitting posture of your kids and sends out reminders to correct their posture.
product_description.Magic UI 2.0: Smart Features for a Smart: The easy-to-use Magic UI 2.0 comes with various features which are designed to help you handle daily tasks. Also, with gesture controls and apps, you can manage your device effortlessly.
product_description.Intuitive Gesture Controls: The Magic UI of this Honor Pad 5 is intuitive and user-friendly which makes navigating between apps quick and simple.
product_description.Manage Your Screen Time with Care: The Time Limit feature of this tablet helps you to manage the amount of time you or your kid spend while using this device.
product_description.Inspired Natural Design and Premium Qual: The aesthetically appealing tablet features a metallic body with smooth edges. This device is also lightweight so you can comfortably hold and use it, enhancing the gaming experience.

review:
Really I was very doubtful when I was going to buy this tab reading some comments on flipkart these doubts arose.
This is my honest opinion..
If u are searching for a tab for reading purpose with massive storage Honor Pad 5 64gb is best for u.
In performance I have not encountered any type of lag.
And let me clarify I am playing PUBG on it for around 1:30 hours a day and I am really impressed with its performance and battery backup. Although it gives HD+high fps the performance is really a beast..
The speakers are lovely with dolby atmos support the sound quality is crystal clear and bass is also good
If your needs match with my one then this is the best tab for u go for it..

Awesome Tablet
Bought on offer time @ price of Rs. 13000 /-
I have 4gb RAM 64gb Storage
Review after 10 Days
1. Great Performance
2. Great Battery Back for 2 days after medium uses
3. Great Specification at this price range
4. Much better than lenovo Tablet
5. One thing is missing if there is any inbuilt stand or holding thing like lenovo yoga tab 3
6. Camera quality also good.
7. Resolution is 1080p
8. Sound quality amazing with Dolby sound software
9. Earphone sound quality and speaker sound quality both are awesome.
10. Battery optimization System is very good. When tablet in idle mode battery not draining
11. You can manage app setting as per your requirement like auto on, notification, battery optimization etc

Model : 4/64GB

Display (3/5) : Not great, but good enough for browsing, studying. Just ok for movies. Not enough contrast for my liking.

Build (4/5) : Build quality is good but the Tab slips away from hand like butter, better buy a case and screen protector ASAP.

Sensors (3/5) : No ambient light sensor, so no auto brightness. Auto rotation, GPS, Bluetooth are there.

Sound (4/5) : There is no stand-alone dolby app like many other tablets/phones. Dolby is embedded into system settings so limited settings I feel. Sound modes of music and smart mode are alike and have good dialogue clarity. Movie mode gives excellent surround sound with a slight compromise in dialogue clarity while watching movies. Sound is loud enough for group watching. In earphones, all modes seem identical with slight surround affect in movie mode. Volume is also on lower side in earphones. (Tested on 1more triple driver in-ear headphones.)

Performance (3/5) : Good for browsing and moderate tasks, felt no lag till now. It is smooth but not fast. File system used is F2FS.

Battery (4/5) : Good enough for a whole day with moderate use. I got 10 hours of screen on time with moderate use.

Interface (3/5) : Though latest Pie is given, I feel there are limited customisations. Still smooth UI.

Camera (2/5) : Didn't use much but still the samples are of below average quality.

Overall I got what I required. Perfect for my needs - reading, browsing and some movie watching with great surround sound, though you need supported content to get surround experience.

I bought 8inch 64gb variant.. Good tab in this price range.. but one major problem is, there is no speaker for voice calling.. we have to connect headphones or else we should talk in loud speaker..other than that display quality is very good.. good for reading and watching movies.. mainly very useful for office peoples to do things like presentation and other kind of document works.. overall worth of money

A fortunate buy since I found out about it completely by accident.

I decided to get a tab after four years of using solely an Android phone, and the Android Tablet scene has changed drastically since then. We always seemed to be compromising something for another: If you have a good display, then the camera is terrible. If you have both a good camera and display, then battery backup is underwhelming.

I almost bought an iPad despite my many inhibitions regarding Apple’s compatibility issues.

But then this new model caught my eye. This tab ticked all the right boxes and at a fantastic price.

I bought the 4 GB variant because I knew this would face heavy usage. I chose the 8 inch simply because of the front camera which is 8 MP compared to the 10.1 inch’s 2 MP.

I don’t use this tab for calling since I find tablets in general too inconvenient for that purpose, but I do use Whatsapp with this. For voice calls, either use your earphones/headphones or the loud speaker. Some of you may find that a dealbreaker, but it wasn’t even a blip in my radar.

If you’re looking for a fully-featured tab for daily usage, like office work or occasional gaming, I’d recommend this tab. Worth the cost in every way.

The best tab in mid range. It comes with a sleek metal body and has a good in hand feel. I've got the 3 gb ram version. It's good enough for normal usage even PUBG runs lag free on HD settings.Awesome battery backup. The 8 inch screen is suitable to read and watch movies the viewing angles are quite good for the price. It's got stereo speakers and the audio is decent and I do dislike the fact that it's got no calling speaker.

This product is really very good
value for money i have orderd 4 gb 64 gb varient
this is good for pubg my experience of pubg is very smooth in hd
battery backup is good
camera quality is good
screen size and bulit quality is great
hd screen is awesome

Gaming performance is smooth( I play asphalt 8). Size is perfect. U can hold in one hand, and work with other hand. Processor is Kirin 710 which is better than Kirin 659 in 10 inch tab.
Sound is superb.
Trurly top class design and phenomenal proformance. back camera and battery performance is titally awesome. i have fallen love with this lovely Honor Tab 5..

A budget Android tablet that is really worth it. Decent mid range processor, adequate storage with SD card expansion option, 4GB RAM which makes multitasking much more responsive, a special UI for tablets which while it is still an Huawei mod on Android is still quite lightweight and responsive. The typical bloatware which seeks a number of permissions is irritating, but most of them can be disabled if not uninstalled completely. The touch response is excellent, the screen is big enough to be immersive for content consumption, viewing angles and resolution and colour reproduction are good, the top and bottom firing dual speakers aren't the loudest but do a good job with sound quality, the battery optimisations are excellent and charging is reasonably fast, and it's not too heavy. All in all, excellent for as an entertainment, social media and productivity device. Good job Honor!!!

What are you buying?

An big android phone with 8.0 screen called tablet

Do you want to game?

go for it , pubg runs fine , cod mobile runs fine except some lags in the 50 or 100 player(on the island survival mode) but it may be , because the game is new and devs are trying fix bugs. Asphalt legends runs fine . You can't do fortnight though.

Do you want to read on it?

yes this is great for reading. i have a kindle too ,it won't beat kindle but the reading mode and the moon plus reader application (playstore) ,make it very pleasing to the eyes. If you buy it for reading ,do download moon plus reader for its versatility to read the book ,make notes , highlight and bunch of features.

you are a camera enthusiast?
don't give me that ,i won't buy it , who buys a tablet for camera?camera is just okay ,i mean you can capture photos , face recognition works fine except when the light is low . Though Don't compare it to any smartphone. It does not even stand up to my 2 year old nubia z17 mini.

wanna do multitasking?
This is good for multitasking. if you are into making notes and switch back and forth to google chrome. You may try to use google docs ,it is good .

Battery?

battery is the best thing about this tablet. It dies really slowly , optimization is awesome . And the fact that it has a built in screen time activity analyser, it would help you to be more productive .i loved it.

screen?
screen is decent too . Though it could be better, I would say 4.327 out of 5.you van also tweak color settings.

security ?
you got face unlock ,pin,pattern ,file hider, app locker, child protection.

Such a device is subjective to one's requirements.
I needed a bare basic device for browsing, streaming and video calls. NO GAMING / PHOTOGRAPHY AT ALL. And as such this Tab packs quite a punch.

Battery backup is a concern. But my device is always at home and right next to the power source so this is covered. Expect 6 to 8 hours at best with Normal use.

Display is great however Outdoor usage is out of the door.

I don't usually deal in data transfer at all so basic Micro USB port is ok for me. I'd have preferred a USB C Port.

Build quality is great. 8 inc. form factor is really great for handling.

Audio quality is boosted due to dual speakers. Very balanced and quite satisfying.

Kirin 710 turns out to be a more than capable horse and it easily carried the load.

Overall, as I stated earlier, for basic functions this is an unparalleled device as of Mar 2021.
